QuestData.Title: Legend of the Animaswell
QuestData.Description:
<This appears to be an incomplete set of notes detailing one archivist's search for a mythical font of anima hidden somewhere deep in Korthia.
Merick Feldscar in the Seat of the Primus would be able to help you put together a team to search for it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Legend of the Animaswell to Merick Feldscar in the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver Legend of the Animaswell to Merick Feldscar in the Seat of the Primus.
